meanings.definition: One who prefers something over another.
meanings.sent1: The preferrer of chocolate ice cream always chooses it over vanilla.
meanings.sent2: My sister is a preferrer of sunny days to rainy ones.
meanings.sent3: The preferrer of naps over exercise always finds a way to sneak in a snooze.
meanings.sent4: Like a bee to honey, the preferrer of peace is drawn to calm and tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The preferrer of quiet moments in nature finds solace in the sound of rustling leaves.

meanings.definition: To choose or favor one thing over another.
meanings.sent1: I always preferrer to wear my favorite blue shirt on Fridays.
meanings.sent2: She will preferrer to watch a movie rather than go for a walk.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed to preferrer the cardboard box over the expensive cat bed.
meanings.sent4: In the battle of flavors, she will always preferrer spicy food over bland.
meanings.sent5: He will preferrer to take the scenic route, even if it takes longer.
